settings.popupcontent:
Size Guide

Size Men & Women US
Size Heel to toe
4.5 - 5 (Women) 8 1/2 - 8 7/8
6 - 7 (Women) 8 3/4 - 9 1/5
8 - 9 (Women) 9 1/4 - 9 6/8
6 - 7 (Men) 9 5/8 - 9 3/8
8 - 9 (Men) 10 - 10 3/8
10 - 11 (Men) 10 5/8 - 11
12 - 13 (Men) 11 3/8 - 11 1/2

Size Guide Information

The inner length of shoe should be longer than foot length.
For example, if your foot length (Heel to Toe) is 9.45inch, choose shoe size 8 - 9 (Womens)


If your size is between two sizes:

1. Choose a smaller size if your foot is thin.
2. Choose a larger size if your foot is wide or normal.

settings.text2: Text field
Text 2
Free Shipping on all orders from the US or orders of $ 99 or more.
Description
SUMMER 2018
No more smelly feet and bacterica! All of Tofles products are covered with Ag+ Silver Ions. The special antibacterial coating eliminates smell and keeps your feet safe germs.

With the necessity of an everyday slide in mind, we created Tofles. 
We combine modern design with astonishing comfort. Treat your feet the way they deserve.

Our Slides are made with High-Quality EVA, that is flexible and super soft. 
Your slide will form to your foot and be super easy to slip in & out off.
Slide into "Futon" and experience true comfort. We created the ultimate slide sole through magnifying EVA molecules. Forget about earth, because you'll be walking on clouds.

We're so happy to celebrate the launch of Tofles, that we offer a buy 2 get 3 discount, Try out all of our special models for yourself, or treat your family with a comfy surprise. Just put 3 Tofles into your cart and you'll get the discount automatically
"I bought these slides back in Mai and I first purchased them for the design, but what really made me obsessed was how comfy they actually are, I love these soo much!!!"
"I really love the simple design and the sole that makes really wearable all day. I actually wear them more outside, than I do at home, really happy with the product."

"It's really hard to say which one is the best, because I love them all and they are all really comfy and wearable outside with a cool outfit. Tofles is really want out of a slide, it's real bargain, if you ask me."

settings.text2: Description
Give your feet what they deserve and feel the difference!

settings.product_item_small_description: Try Futon our most comfortable slide that can be worn for any occasion.
Do you like it Casual? This is the right slide for you, a fits-all design and a sole that supports you all day.
A Cool looking slide with a thick sole that is really comforting? That's Kajak.

settings.first-line-text: A Slide that can do both
settings.second-line-text: Comforts you at home or gives you the extra spice for your outfit. Stay-in or Stand-out.

Our soles are designed to provide great cushioning all day. We know how annoying it is to change a slide after a few months, just because it doesn’t feel the same, with Tofles you don’t have to worry about that!
Your comfort doesn’t come at nature’s expense. Our manufacturing process uses only environmentally friendly materials. Even our packaging is from organic cotton! No harm, just comfort.

settings.text1: Be a part of the movement!
settings.text2: Enjoy early access to our new designs and releases.
